A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: A long\, long time ago in a galaxy far\, far away.... The 8th Episode The Last Jedi NEVER EXISTED ... Aaahhhhhhhh!!!!!!! The offbeat comedy sucked and was displaced. It seemed like they were making fun of the previous episodes and characters. The story that Force Awakens set up was ignored as \"so what\" .. The Tinkerbell incident with Leia when she got blown out was stupid.. Snoke's death was the dumbest ending i could ever think of... YES\, the Plagueis backstory would have been perfect... AND WFT with Luke?!?!? Crazy Yoda syndrome!!! Finn and Plasma .. too easy.. and Ffff'en Disney this is NOT a Mickey Mouse candy ass trip for kids!!! Ruin your next set of SW Trilogies\, NOT the existing Skywalker story that is close to ending and Lucas-perfect as-is! We just want a perfect ending to the story\, why is that so hard Disney\, you make your money anyway... So get it right for future generations to come!!!!
